name: GET IN MY CART: 9 Things I'm Buying in Adore's Huge 4-Day Click Frenzy Sale
seo_desc: Meet our 2021 Click Frenzy best deals, including what Adore Beauty staffers are adding to their Click Frenzy sale cart.
top_heading: GET IN MY CART: 9 Things I'm Buying in Adore's Huge 4-Day Click Frenzy Sale
content_heading: GET IN MY CART: 9 Things I'm Buying in Adore's Huge 4-Day Click Frenzy Sale
content: Meet our 2021 Click Frenzy best deals, including what Adore Beauty staffers are adding to their Click Frenzy sale cart.

postContent.content:
{"html":"


<\/code><\/p>

<\/p>

Friends, it's that time again.\u00a0CLICK FRENZY TIME.<\/p>

Sorry for shouting, but this is exciting news! <\/p>

The Adore Beauty 2021 Click Frenzy Sale has landed and we've got a tonne of epic bargains for you.<\/p>

When:<\/strong> Our 4-day Click Frenzy sale is running from 12:01am AEDT on Monday November 8<\/strong> until 11:59pm AEDT <\/strong>on Thursday November 11<\/strong>.<\/p>

What: <\/strong>Up to 40% off selected products from more than 30 of our top skincare, haircare, electrical, makeup, and sex and wellness brands including:<\/p>

  • Skin:<\/strong> SkinCeuticals, Medik8, Alpha-H, Laneige, Beaut\u00e9 Pacifique, Trophy Skin and more.<\/p><\/li>

  • Hair:<\/strong> Dyson*, Virtue, Christophe Robin, NAK Hair and more.<\/p><\/li>

  • Makeup:<\/strong> IT Cosmetics, Giorgio Armani, Anastasia Beverly Hills, MAKE UP FOR EVER and more.<\/p><\/li>

  • Sex and wellness: <\/strong>VUSH, Vida Glow supplements, Swisse Beauty and Apotecari.<\/p><\/li>

  • See <\/strong>full list of discounted Click Frenzy brands<\/strong><\/a> here.<\/strong><\/p><\/li><\/ul>"}
{"embedTitle":"Yes giphy","externalEmbed":"

{"html":"

Basically, now is the perfect time to stock up on your favourite products, or try that buzzy new launch you've been contemplating.<\/p>

Only problem is... with so many great products and brands on sale, how the heck are you meant to choose what to add to your cart?<\/p>

That's where I come in. <\/p>

Keep scrolling for exactly what a beauty editor would buy in our massive 96-hour Click Frenzy sale.<\/p>

*Exclusions apply. No discount code required, final price reflected in Shopping Bag. Offers start 8.11.21 at 12.01am AEDT and ends 11.11.21 at 11:59pm AEDT. T&Cs apply.<\/em><\/p>


<\/code><\/p>

1. Selected SkinCeuticals Products - 20% off.<\/h2>

<\/p>

What: <\/strong><\/p>

A selection of six of our best-selling SkinCeuticals products.<\/p>

Why you should 100% add to cart:<\/strong><\/p>

Look, it\u2019d be weird if I didn\u2019t mention stocking up on SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic Serum<\/a> or giving it a go while it\u2019s on sale.<\/p>

It\u2019s a no-brainer.<\/p>

So, rather than trying to convince you the cult SkinCeuticals vitamin C serum is worth the money, how about I tell you exactly what SkinCeuticals products are on sale and how much you can save.<\/p>

Sound good?<\/p>

  • SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic Serum - $182.40, save $45.60.<\/strong><\/p><\/li>

  • SkinCeuticals Hyaluronic Acid Intensifier - $118.40, save $29.60.<\/strong><\/p><\/li>

  • SkinCeuticals Phyto Corrective Gel - $80, save $20.<\/strong><\/p><\/li>

  • SkinCeuticals Phloretin CF - $182.40, save $45.60.<\/strong><\/p><\/li>

  • SkinCeuticals Silymarin CF - $182.40, save $45.60.<\/strong><\/p><\/li>

  • SkinCeuticals Triple Lipid Restore - $146.40, save $36.60.<\/strong><\/p><\/li><\/ul>

    Not sure which SkinCeuticals vitamin C serum is best for your skin type? I break it down in this YouTube video below.<\/em><\/p>"}

{"html":"

2. Dyson Supersonic.<\/h2>

<\/p>

What:<\/strong><\/p>

Dyson Supersonic Iron Fuchsia 605C<\/a><\/p>

Why you should 100% add to cart:<\/strong><\/p>

Another sale purchase that just makes sense<\/em>.<\/p>

The exxy price tag means a 15% discount delivers an epic $89.85 saving. <\/p>

Consider this your sign to finally take the Dyson plunge.<\/p>

You can read about what makes the Dyson hair dryer worth the hype in our full Dyson Supersonic review here<\/a>, but I can tell you the \u2018flyaways\u2019 attachment is a game-changer.<\/p>

Anecdotal feedback is, once you go a Dyson hair dryer, it\u2019s highly unlikely you\u2019ll wanna dry your hair with anything else.<\/p>"}

{"title":"Shop Dyson Supersonic Here","type":"Primary","url":"https:\/\/www.adorebeauty.com.au\/dyson\/dyson-supersonic-iron-fuchsia-605c.html","textColour":null,"buttonColour":null,"calendarDate":null,"bambusershowId":null}

{"html":"


<\/code><\/p>

3. Beaut\u00e9 Pacifique Instant Hydrating Mask.<\/h2>

<\/p>

What:<\/strong><\/p>

Beaut\u00e9 Pacifique Instant Hydrating Mask 100ml<\/a><\/p>

Why you should 100% add to cart:<\/strong><\/p>

Controversial opinion: I reckon this is *even better* than the Aspect probiotic mask everyone raves about.<\/p>

And that is a very good mask, so that\u2019s saying something.<\/p>

The luscious, intensely hydrating cream texture can be used as a wash-off 15-minute mask, or an evening moisturiser.<\/p>

It's full of everything skin barriers froth over - squalane, lanolin, collagen, and a spattering of vitamins A, C and E - to hydrate and fortify your skin. <\/p>

Every cosmeceutical or active skincare lover needs a tube of this on hand for when they inevitably break their skin barrier.<\/p>

I'm onto my fourth or fifth tube and can't stop, won't stop.<\/p>"}

{"title":"Shop Beaut\u00e9 Pacifique Instant Hydrating Mask here!","type":"Primary","url":"https:\/\/www.adorebeauty.com.au\/beaute-pacifique\/beaute-pacifique-instant-hydrating-mask-100ml.html","textColour":null,"buttonColour":null,"calendarDate":null,"bambusershowId":null}

{"html":"


<\/code><\/p>

4. Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Freeze.<\/h2>

<\/p>

What:<\/strong><\/p>

Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Freeze<\/a><\/p>

Why you should 100% add to cart:<\/strong><\/p>

When\u00a0Anastasia Beverly Hills first launched on Adore Beauty<\/a>\u00a0in early 2021, the one question everyone was asking around the office was:<\/p>

Should I buy Brow Freeze?<\/em><\/p>

My answer was yes. Then it sold out. Then it sold out, again<\/em>.<\/p>

Now, we've basically secured a never-ending supply of this unique clear brow gel\/wax\/jelly hybrid that delivers a brow lamination look without... needing to get a brow lamination. <\/p>

How you apply it is crucial to understanding the Brow Freeze hype. <\/p>

I saw Beauty IQ writer Amelia Singson<\/a> apply it by scooping the product out using the Anastasia Beverly Hills Brow Freeze Applicator<\/a> and placing it directly onto the brows before brushing through using the spoolie end. <\/p>

I refuse to use it any other way now.<\/p>"}

<\/code><\/p>

5. Maybelline The Falsies Lash Lift Volumising Mascara.<\/h2>

<\/p>

What:<\/strong><\/p>

Maybelline The Falsies Lash Lift Volumising Mascara - Ultra Black<\/p>

Why you should 100% add to cart:<\/strong><\/p>

I often think affordable mascaras are just as good as the expensive ones.<\/p>

But seriously, the 40% discount makes this already bargain mascara practically free.<\/p>

You can use the curved bristle mascara wand a few different ways depending on how you like your lashes to look. <\/p>

Want length and separation? Wipe excess product off on the side of the mascara tube and apply gently, wiggling the brush at the base of your lashes to make sure you get \u2018em all.<\/p>

Love thick lashes with stacks of volume? Pack on the product and go for two or three coats (tip: to avoid crunchy lashes, don\u2019t let the mascara dry between coats). <\/p>

As you can see in the pic above, just one coat of mascara on my right eyelashes makes a big difference.<\/p>"}

{"html":"


<\/code><\/p>

6. Medik8 Oxy-R Peptides.<\/h2>"}

What:<\/strong><\/p>

<\/strong>Medik8 Oxy-R Peptides 2 x10ml<\/strong><\/p>

Why you should 100% add to cart:<\/strong><\/p>

This is one of the few products on this list I'm yet to try... but that's exactly why<\/em> it's on the list. <\/p>

I've been seeing the potent hyperpigmentation serum all over Instagram, like in this *chef's kiss* snap from @beauty.dews_<\/a> .<\/p>

The active formula comes in two smaller bottles to keep it efficacious to the last drop.<\/p>

It contains 1% Oxyresveratrol (a super strength tyrosinase inhibitor) and a mix of peptides, and promises to have an intense brightening effect on the skin...<\/p>

Into the cart it goes.<\/p>"}

<\/code><\/p>

7. Trophy Skin LED Device.<\/h2>

<\/p>

What:<\/strong><\/p>

Trophy Skin RejuvaliteMD<\/a><\/p>

Why you should 100% add to cart:<\/strong><\/p>

I have been *gagging* to get my face under this at-home LED light therapy device.<\/p>

Skincare tools like this one aren't must-have products, but the $65 saving is very enticing...<\/p>

Plus, you can literally lie down underneath it. Hands free. Podcast playing. Preferably with someone giving you a foot massage.<\/p>

I highly recommend watching fellow beauty ed Joanna's at-home LED light therapy YouTube video below.<\/p>

For her Trophy Skin LED review<\/a>.<\/p>

But also to hear (and witness) the tale of that one time she got the biggest bruise you've ever seen. On her butt.<\/p>"}

{"html":"


<\/code><\/p>

8. Juliette Has a Gun Pear.<\/h2>

<\/p>

What:<\/strong><\/p>

<\/strong>Juliette Has A Gun Pear Inc 50ml EDP<\/strong><\/p>

Why you should 100% add to cart:<\/strong><\/p>

I'm calling it: Juliette Has A Gun Pear<\/a> is the underdog in the race to become the<\/em> scent of post-lockdown freedom.<\/p>

The playful, fruity fragrance is way more than just 'pear', with notes like:<\/p>

  • Head (top) notes: Green Pear Accord.<\/p><\/li>

  • Heart (middle) notes: Ambroxan.<\/p><\/li>

  • Base (bottom) notes: Musks.<\/p><\/li><\/ul>

    It smells like a delightful spring or summer European holiday, and who doesn't need or desperately want one of those?!<\/p>

    One spritz of this and you could be sailing around the Greek Islands, sipping Limoncello in Positano or lounging on a super yacht off the South of France.<\/p>

    *OK, maybe that last one's a stretch, but this fragrance makes you dream big.<\/em><\/p>"}

9. Christophe Robin Scalp Scrub.<\/h2>"}

What:<\/strong><\/p>

<\/strong>Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub<\/a><\/strong><\/p>

Why you should 100% add to cart:<\/strong><\/p>

Last but not least, let's discuss why this scalp scrub is the GOAT (greatest of all time).<\/p>

I literally scrape out every last bit of the luscious scrub, and even when it\u2019s empty, I hang onto the tub hoping it might magically refill itself. <\/p>

Sadly, that\u2019s the one thing this scalp scrub can\u2019t do. <\/p>

If you're not into grainy hair scrubs that feel like rubbing coffee grounds on your hair, you'll love how this one foams up like a luxe shampoo. <\/p>

Nothing leaves my hair feeling cleaner than this scrub. It doesn't hurt that it also smells divine. <\/p>

Adore staffer Hannah even says it tastes good... you do you<\/em>.<\/p>"}
